purpose.summary: This JCL job executes the IMS reconstruction utility DFSRRC00 in BMP mode to load the PAUDB IMS database (DBD=PAUDBLOD) using PSB=PSBPAUTB. It reads sequential input files for root and child segments. Standard IMS DD statements and dumps are provided for execution.
purpose.business_context: Supports loading data into PAUTDB IMS database for AWS M2 Card Demo application

inputs.name: INFILE1
inputs.description: Sequential file containing root segment data for PAUTDB database load

inputs.name: INFILE2
inputs.description: Sequential file containing child segment data for PAUTDB database load

inputs.name: STEPLIB
inputs.description: Load libraries for IMS SDFSRESL and application loadlib

inputs.name: DFSVSAMP
inputs.description: IMS VSAM database definition member DFSVSMDB

outputs.name: SYSPRINT
outputs.description: Standard print output from the utility execution

outputs.name: SYSUDUMP
outputs.description: System dump output for abnormal terminations

called_programs.purpose: IMS database reconstruction utility to load PAUDB database segments from input files

paragraphs.purpose: Executes IMS DFSRRC00 utility with PARM and DD allocations to load PAUDB database

open_questions.question: Exact segment names and structures in INFILE1 and INFILE2
open_questions.context: JCL does not specify field-level details; would require examining the input files or DBD/PSB definitions
open_questions.suggestion: Review DBD source for PAUDBLOD and input file layouts

open_questions.question: Purpose of commented DDPAUTP0 and DDPAUTX0
open_questions.context: Lines 40-41 are commented out; unclear if they were previously used for database access
open_questions.suggestion: Check job history or related documentation

open_questions.question: Role of DFSVSAMP (DFSVSMDB)
open_questions.context: DD points to a PROCLIB member; exact usage in DFSRRC00 not determinable from JCL alone
open_questions.suggestion: Consult IMS DFSRRC00 documentation for DFSVSAMP DD requirement
